posts.cooked_content:
I am an international student with none of my peers here in this course. It would be amazing to work with other people taking this course this term and doing the assignments together.

a few brains are better than one brain
posts.cleaned_text: I am an international student with none of my peers here in this course. It would be amazing to work with other people taking this course this term and doing the assignments together. a few brains are better than one brain

posts.cooked_content: Yes indeed. We must connect to solve these assignments and prepare for ROE from now
posts.cleaned_text: Yes indeed. We must connect to solve these assignments and prepare for ROE from now

posts.cooked_content: you can use https://acegrade.in to find community of people with same subjects as you . Just use the ‘Groups’ tab of the website and you will prolly find lot’s of friends there .

posts.cooked_content: Hey, I am Azhaan, the regional coordinator of Bandipur International. DM me on WhatsApp and I will connect you with the International Community of IITM BS. I am sending you a chat.
